pages.text: Acquired by defeating the $(l:bewitchment:creatures/lilith)Vampire Queen$() in battle, these shoes have a protection comparable to $(item)Netherite Boots$().$(br2)Because of their dark energies, the $(marked)undead$() are neutral to the wearer.
The Harbinger's shoe pairs can be repaired using $(item)Netherite$().$(br2)Finally, drip shoes.
